admins_insert_admin.name: admins_insert_admin
admins_insert_admin.withCheck:
EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM admins
          WHERE email = (auth.jwt()->>'email')::text
        )

admins_delete_admin.name: admins_delete_admin
admins_delete_admin.using:
EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM admins
          WHERE email = (auth.jwt()->>'email')::text
        )

learning_card_select_active.name: learning_card_select_active
learning_card_select_active.using:
"learning_card"."is_active" = true
        AND EXISTS (
          SELECT 1 FROM "learning_content"
          WHERE "learning_content"."id" = "learning_card"."learning_content_id"
          AND "learning_content"."is_active" = true
          AND EXISTS (
            SELECT 1 FROM "learning_product"
            WHERE "learning_product"."id" = "learning_content"."learning_product_id"
            AND "learning_product"."is_active" = true
          )
        )

learning_card_select_admin.name: learning_card_select_admin
learning_card_select_admin.using:
EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM admins
    WHERE email = (auth.jwt()->>'email')::text
  )
